name: ZapBallz
description: ZapBallz is a shooting arcade-style game for the Oculus Quest 2.  Pick your weapons and enter into a room with 108 connecting pipes.  As giant cannonballs come flying through these pipes your mission is to blow them up before they make it through the room and out the other side.  Collect coins to unlock new weapons and try and beat your high score.  :)
